patthana3.1:1216.1: Nahetuṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … adhipatipaccayā … sahajātapaccayā … aññamaññapaccayā … nissayapaccayā … kammapaccayā … vipākapaccayā … āhārapaccayā … indriyapaccayā … jhānapaccayā … maggapaccayā … vippayuttapaccayā … atthipaccayā … avigatapaccayā.
patthana3.1:1217.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, sahajāte ekaṁ, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye ekaṁ, kamme ekaṁ, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre ekaṁ, indriye ekaṁ, jhāne ekaṁ, magge ekaṁ, vippayutte ekaṁ, atthiyā ekaṁ, avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.1:1218.1: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā ekaṁ (sabbe paccayā kātabbā) …pe… novigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.1:1219.1: Nahetu anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa anidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana3.1:1220.1: Hetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.1:1221.1: Nahetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.1:1222.1: Hetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca nahetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.1:1223.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.1:1224.1: Nahetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana3.1:1225.1: Hetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.1:1226.1: Hetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.1:1227.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.1:1230.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.1:1231.1: Hetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo hetussa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.1:1232.1: Hetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo hetussa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana3.1:1233.1: Hetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo hetussa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana3.1:1234.1: Nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana3.1:1235.1: Hetu anidassanaappaṭigho ca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā hetussa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.1:1236.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.1:1237.1: Hetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo hetussa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.1:1241.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
